scripts.setup: npm install && mix local.hex --force && mix local.rebar --force && mix deps.get && mix deps.compile
scripts.dev: mix ecto.setup && mix ecto.seed && mix phx.server
scripts.old-test: npm run startS3 && MIX_ENV=test mix do compile, test --trace && npm run stopS3
scripts.old-test-coverage-backend: npm run startS3 && MIX_ENV=test mix do compile --warnings-as-errors, coveralls.json --trace && npm run stopS3
scripts.old-download-prod-db: MIX_ENV=dev mix ecto.drop && heroku pg:pull -a arkad-nexpo DATABASE_URL nexpo_dev
